Title: Frank the Plank
Writer: John Wells (developed for american television by), Paul Abbott (creator), Paul Abbott (based on 'episode 2' of the british series written by), John Wells (teleplay), Paul Abbott (teleplay)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: A manhunt ensues after Frank goes on a bender and turns up missing on Friday, the day he never fails to cash his disability check, and turns up in Toronto with no idea how he got there.
